title: How to build an information time machine
description: Imagine if you could surf Facebook ... from the Middle Ages. Well, it may not be as far off as it sounds. In a fun and interesting talk, Frederic Kaplan shows off the Venice Time Machine, a project to digitize 80 kilometers of books to create a historical and geographical simulation of Venice across 1,000 years.
author: Frederic Kaplan
keywords: TED, talks, TEDx, computers, history, library, map, technology, books
